overview:
Mr. Cnaan brings to NewACT more than 20 years of experience in international finance and operations management. Gad was CFO and G&A manager for Followap, now part of NeuStar (NYSE: NSR), CFO of Celletra, acquired in 2006 by Unity Wireless Corp. and financial manager of Galtronics, a leader in innovative antenna solutions for mobile phones. Gad brings vast experience in managing and directing finances through the corporate life cycle from start-up and fund raising, through contract and risk management, to established and profitable organizations.

During his career, Gad has setup subsidiaries in the USA, China and Europe.

Gad holds a BA in Economics and MBA (Cum Laude), from the Hebrew University.
